errorMessages.networkError: Sorry, we were unable to store your response due to a network connectivity issue. Please try clicking on "Send" again.
errorMessages.username: It seems somebody has already chosen your preferred username / nickname. Please enter a different one and click again on "Send".
errorMessages.email: It seems you already have an account on our forum using this e-mail address, or have entered an invalid address. Please choose a different e-mail address and click again on "Send".
errorMessages.default: Sorry, we were unable to store your response due to an unknown error. Please try clicking on "Send" again.
